name: Backrooms：The Exit
description:
Explore each distinct space and level in a space based on the popular Backroom Lore, each level has a different way of leaving and you may find some magical eggs inside.

Gameplay style: Realistic gameplay with the player's point of view being the camera in the game's characters (all the time), except at the last moment;

Game scenarios: there may be environments that seem calm and appropriate, but sometimes they come to familiar yet scary environments;

Monster entities: it seems like all entities are threatening to the player, or maybe not;

Backroom Background: you are an important experimenter who has to explore the backroom, even though many of your predecessors have been lost inside;

Inventory props: there seems to be more than just almond water in there, but you'll have to try them out to find out what their respective effects are.
